title: Hours Spent on the Phone
body: Previously, an organization reported that teenagers spent $$4.5$$ hours per week, on average, on the phone. The organization thinks that, currently, the mean is higher. Fifteen randomly chosen teenagers were asked how many hours per week they spend on the phone. The sample mean was $$4.75$$ hours with a sample standard deviation of $$2.0$$.
lesson: 9.2 Outcomes and the Type I and Type II Errors
